s.text: I wish boomer pundits would get over the guilt of not serving in Vietnam: They were right.
It was telling to me that CNN spent four hours of airtime on the funeral of the black boy who was killed.
Swanson writes in his sniffy Observer way: "Nobody ever said the Voice was all about the high road" and objects to the headline of the column "I Am Butt Girl, Hear My Ass Roar!"
People forget he was part of the Keating Five.
People forget he was part of the Keating Five.
